00032  *
00033  * cpp macro implementation of left-leaning 2-3 red-black trees.  Parent
00034  * pointers are not used, and color bits are stored in the least significant
00035  * bit of right-child pointers (if RB_COMPACT is defined), thus making node
00036  * linkage as compact as is possible for red-black trees.
00037  *
00038  * Usage:
00039  *
00040  *   #include <stdint.h>
00041  *   #include <stdbool.h>
00042  *   #define NDEBUG // (Optional, see assert(3).)
00043  *   #include <assert.h>
00044  *   #define RB_COMPACT // (Optional, embed color bits in right-child pointers.)
00045  *   #include <rb.h>
00046  *   ...
00047  *
00048  *******************************************************************************
00049  */
00050 
00051 #ifndef RB_H_
00052 #define RB_H_
00053 
00054 /*#include <sys/cdefs.h>*/
00055 /*__FBSDID("$FreeBSD: src/lib/libc/stdlib/rb.h,v 1.5 2010/02/28 22:57:13 jasone Exp $");*/
00056 
00057 #ifdef RB_COMPACT
00058 /* Node structure. */
00059 #define rb_node(a_type)                                                 \
00060 struct {                                                                \
00061     a_type *rbn_left;                                                   \
00062     a_type *rbn_right_red;                                              \
00063 }
00064 #else
00065 #define rb_node(a_type)                                                 \
00066 struct {                                                                \
00067     a_type *rbn_left;                                                   \
00068     a_type *rbn_right;                                                  \
00069     bool rbn_red;                                                       \
00070 }
00071 #endif
00072 
00073 /* Root structure. */
00074 #define rb_tree(a_type)                                                 \
00075 struct {                                                                \
00076     a_type *rbt_root;                                                   \
00077     a_type rbt_nil;                                                     \
00078 }
00079 
00080 /* Left accessors. */
00081 #define rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, a_node)                          \
00082     ((a_node)->a_field.rbn_left)
00083 #define rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, a_node, a_left) do {             \
00084     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_left = a_left;                                \
00085 } while (0)
00086 
00087 #ifdef RB_COMPACT
00088 /* Right accessors. */
00089 #define rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, a_node)                         \
00090     ((a_type *) (((intptr_t) (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red)           \
00091       & ((ssize_t)-2)))
00092 #define rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, a_node, a_right) do {           \
00093     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red = (a_type *) (((uintptr_t) a_right) \
00094       | (((uintptr_t) (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red) & ((size_t)1))); \
00095 } while (0)
00096 
00097 /* Color accessors. */
00098 #define rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, a_node)                           \
00099     ((bool) (((uintptr_t) (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red)              \
00100       & ((size_t)1)))
00101 #define rbtn_color_set(a_type, a_field, a_node, a_red) do {             \
00102     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red = (a_type *) ((((intptr_t)          \
00103       (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red) & ((ssize_t)-2))                 \
00104       | ((ssize_t)a_red));                                              \
00105 } while (0)
00106 #define rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, a_node) do {                      \
00107     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red = (a_type *) (((uintptr_t)          \
00108       (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red) | ((size_t)1));                  \
00109 } while (0)
00110 #define rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, a_node) do {                    \
00111     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red = (a_type *) (((intptr_t)           \
00112       (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right_red) & ((ssize_t)-2));                \
00113 } while (0)
00114 #else
00115 /* Right accessors. */
00116 #define rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, a_node)                         \
00117     ((a_node)->a_field.rbn_right)
00118 #define rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, a_node, a_right) do {           \
00119     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_right = a_right;                              \
00120 } while (0)
00121 
00122 /* Color accessors. */
00123 #define rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, a_node)                           \
00124     ((a_node)->a_field.rbn_red)
00125 #define rbtn_color_set(a_type, a_field, a_node, a_red) do {             \
00126     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_red = (a_red);                                \
00127 } while (0)
00128 #define rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, a_node) do {                      \
00129     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_red = true;                                   \
00130 } while (0)
00131 #define rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, a_node) do {                    \
00132     (a_node)->a_field.rbn_red = false;                                  \
00133 } while (0)
00134 #endif
00135 
00136 /* Node initializer. */
00137 #define rbt_node_new(a_type, a_field, a_rbt, a_node) do {               \
00138     rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, (a_node), &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil);        \
00139     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, (a_node), &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil);       \
00140     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, (a_node));                            \
00141 } while (0)
00142 
00143 /* Tree initializer. */
00144 #define rb_new(a_type, a_field, a_rbt) do {                             \
00145     (a_rbt)->rbt_root = &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil;                              \
00146     rbt_node_new(a_type, a_field, a_rbt, &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil);            \
00147     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil);                 \
00148 } while (0)
00149 
00150 /* Internal utility macros. */
00151 #define rbtn_first(a_type, a_field, a_rbt, a_root, r_node) do {         \
00152     (r_node) = (a_root);                                                \
00153     if ((r_node) != &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil) {                                \
00154         for (;                                                          \
00155           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, (r_node)) != &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil;\
00156           (r_node) = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, (r_node))) {        \
00157         }                                                               \
00158     }                                                                   \
00159 } while (0)
00160 
00161 #define rbtn_last(a_type, a_field, a_rbt, a_root, r_node) do {          \
00162     (r_node) = (a_root);                                                \
00163     if ((r_node) != &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil) {                                \
00164         for (; rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, (r_node)) !=             \
00165           &(a_rbt)->rbt_nil; (r_node) = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, \
00166           (r_node))) {                                                  \
00167         }                                                               \
00168     }                                                                   \
00169 } while (0)
00170 
00171 #define rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, a_node, r_node) do {          \
00172     (r_node) = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, (a_node));               \
00173     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, (a_node),                           \
00174       rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, (r_node)));                        \
00175     rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, (r_node), (a_node));                 \
00176 } while (0)
00177 
00178 #define rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, a_node, r_node) do {         \
00179     (r_node) = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, (a_node));                \
00180     rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, (a_node),                            \
00181       rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, (r_node)));                       \
00182     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, (r_node), (a_node));                \
00183 } while (0)
00184 
00185 /*
00186  * The rb_proto() macro generates function prototypes that correspond to the
00187  * functions generated by an equivalently parameterized call to rb_gen().
00188  */
00189 
00190 #define rb_proto(a_attr, a_prefix, a_rbt_type, a_type)                  \
00191 a_attr void                                                             \
00192 a_prefix##new(a_rbt_type *rbtree);                                      \
00193 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00194 a_prefix##first(a_rbt_type *rbtree);                                    \
00195 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00196 a_prefix##last(a_rbt_type *rbtree);                                     \
00197 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00198 a_prefix##next(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node);                       \
00199 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00200 a_prefix##prev(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node);                       \
00201 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00202 a_prefix##search(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key);                      \
00203 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00204 a_prefix##nsearch(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key);                     \
00205 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00206 a_prefix##psearch(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key);                     \
00207 a_attr void                                                             \
00208 a_prefix##insert(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node);                     \
00209 a_attr void                                                             \
00210 a_prefix##remove(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node);                     \
00211 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00212 a_prefix##iter(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start, a_type *(*cb)(        \
00213   a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg);                          \
00214 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00215 a_prefix##reverse_iter(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start,               \
00216   a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg);
00217 
00218 /*
00219  * The rb_gen() macro generates a type-specific red-black tree implementation,
00220  * based on the above cpp macros.
00221  *
00222  * Arguments:
00223  *
00224  *   a_attr    : Function attribute for generated functions (ex: static).
00225  *   a_prefix  : Prefix for generated functions (ex: extree_).
00226  *   a_rb_type : Type for red-black tree data structure (ex: extree_t).
00227  *   a_type    : Type for red-black tree node data structure (ex:
00228  *               extree_node_t).
00229  *   a_field   : Name of red-black tree node linkage (ex: extree_link).
00230  *   a_cmp     : Node comparison function name, with the following prototype:
00231  *                 int (a_cmp *)(a_type *a_node, a_type *a_other);
00232  *                                       ^^^^^^
00233  *                                    or a_key
00234  *               Interpretation of comparision function return values:
00235  *                 -1 : a_node <  a_other
00236  *                  0 : a_node == a_other
00237  *                  1 : a_node >  a_other
00238  *               In all cases, the a_node or a_key macro argument is the first
00239  *               argument to the comparison function, which makes it possible
00240  *               to write comparison functions that treat the first argument
00241  *               specially.
00242  *
00243  * Assuming the following setup:
00244  *
00245  *   typedef struct ex_node_s ex_node_t;
00246  *   struct ex_node_s {
00247  *       rb_node(ex_node_t) ex_link;
00248  *   };
00249  *   typedef rb(ex_node_t) ex_t;
00250  *   rb_gen(static, ex_, ex_t, ex_node_t, ex_link, ex_cmp, 1297, 1301)
00251  *
00252  * The following API is generated:
00253  *
00254  *   static void
00255  *   ex_new(ex_t *extree);
00256  *       Description: Initialize a red-black tree structure.
00257  *       Args:
00258  *         extree: Pointer to an uninitialized red-black tree object.
00259  *
00260  *   static ex_node_t *
00261  *   ex_first(ex_t *extree);
00262  *   static ex_node_t *
00263  *   ex_last(ex_t *extree);
00264  *       Description: Get the first/last node in extree.
00265  *       Args:
00266  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00267  *       Ret: First/last node in extree, or NULL if extree is empty.
00268  *
00269  *   static ex_node_t *
00270  *   ex_next(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *node);
00271  *   static ex_node_t *
00272  *   ex_prev(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *node);
00273  *       Description: Get node's successor/predecessor.
00274  *       Args:
00275  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00276  *         node : A node in extree.
00277  *       Ret: node's successor/predecessor in extree, or NULL if node is
00278  *            last/first.
00279  *
00280  *   static ex_node_t *
00281  *   ex_search(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *key);
00282  *       Description: Search for node that matches key.
00283  *       Args:
00284  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00285  *         key  : Search key.
00286  *       Ret: Node in extree that matches key, or NULL if no match.
00287  *
00288  *   static ex_node_t *
00289  *   ex_nsearch(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *key);
00290  *   static ex_node_t *
00291  *   ex_psearch(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *key);
00292  *       Description: Search for node that matches key.  If no match is found,
00293  *                    return what would be key's successor/predecessor, were
00294  *                    key in extree.
00295  *       Args:
00296  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00297  *         key   : Search key.
00298  *       Ret: Node in extree that matches key, or if no match, hypothetical
00299  *            node's successor/predecessor (NULL if no successor/predecessor).
00300  *
00301  *   static void
00302  *   ex_insert(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *node);
00303  *       Description: Insert node into extree.
00304  *       Args:
00305  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00306  *         node  : Node to be inserted into extree.
00307  *
00308  *   static void
00309  *   ex_remove(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *node);
00310  *       Description: Remove node from extree.
00311  *       Args:
00312  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00313  *         node  : Node in extree to be removed.
00314  *
00315  *   static ex_node_t *
00316  *   ex_iter(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *start, ex_node_t *(*cb)(ex_t *,
00317  *     ex_node_t *, void *), void *arg);
00318  *   static ex_node_t *
00319  *   ex_reverse_iter(ex_t *extree, ex_node_t *start, ex_node *(*cb)(ex_t *,
00320  *     ex_node_t *, void *), void *arg);
00321  *       Description: Iterate forward/backward over extree, starting at node.
00322  *                    If extree is modified, iteration must be immediately
00323  *                    terminated by the callback function that causes the
00324  *                    modification.
00325  *       Args:
00326  *         extree: Pointer to an initialized red-black tree object.
00327  *         start : Node at which to start iteration, or NULL to start at
00328  *                 first/last node.
00329  *         cb    : Callback function, which is called for each node during
00330  *                 iteration.  Under normal circumstances the callback function
00331  *                 should return NULL, which causes iteration to continue.  If a
00332  *                 callback function returns non-NULL, iteration is immediately
00333  *                 terminated and the non-NULL return value is returned by the
00334  *                 iterator.  This is useful for re-starting iteration after
00335  *                 modifying extree.
00336  *         arg   : Opaque pointer passed to cb().
00337  *       Ret: NULL if iteration completed, or the non-NULL callback return value
00338  *            that caused termination of the iteration.
00339  */
00340 #define rb_gen(a_attr, a_prefix, a_rbt_type, a_type, a_field, a_cmp)    \
00341 a_attr void                                                             \
00342 a_prefix##new(a_rbt_type *rbtree) {                                     \
00343     rb_new(a_type, a_field, rbtree);                                    \
00344 }                                                                       \
00345 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00346 a_prefix##first(a_rbt_type *rbtree) {                                   \
00347     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00348     rbtn_first(a_type, a_field, rbtree, rbtree->rbt_root, ret);         \
00349     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00350         ret = NULL;                                                     \
00351     }                                                                   \
00352     return (ret);                                                       \
00353 }                                                                       \
00354 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00355 a_prefix##last(a_rbt_type *rbtree) {                                    \
00356     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00357     rbtn_last(a_type, a_field, rbtree, rbtree->rbt_root, ret);          \
00358     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00359         ret = NULL;                                                     \
00360     }                                                                   \
00361     return (ret);                                                       \
00362 }                                                                       \
00363 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00364 a_prefix##next(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node) {                      \
00365     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00366     if (rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, node) != &rbtree->rbt_nil) {    \
00367         rbtn_first(a_type, a_field, rbtree, rbtn_right_get(a_type,      \
00368           a_field, node), ret);                                         \
00369     } else {                                                            \
00370         a_type *tnode = rbtree->rbt_root;                               \
00371         assert(tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil);                              \
00372         ret = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                                         \
00373         while (true) {                                                  \
00374             int cmp = (a_cmp)(node, tnode);                             \
00375             if (cmp < 0) {                                              \
00376                 ret = tnode;                                            \
00377                 tnode = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);          \
00378             } else if (cmp > 0) {                                       \
00379                 tnode = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);         \
00380             } else {                                                    \
00381                 break;                                                  \
00382             }                                                           \
00383             assert(tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil);                          \
00384         }                                                               \
00385     }                                                                   \
00386     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00387         ret = (NULL);                                                   \
00388     }                                                                   \
00389     return (ret);                                                       \
00390 }                                                                       \
00391 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00392 a_prefix##prev(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node) {                      \
00393     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00394     if (rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node) != &rbtree->rbt_nil) {     \
00395         rbtn_last(a_type, a_field, rbtree, rbtn_left_get(a_type,        \
00396           a_field, node), ret);                                         \
00397     } else {                                                            \
00398         a_type *tnode = rbtree->rbt_root;                               \
00399         assert(tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil);                              \
00400         ret = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                                         \
00401         while (true) {                                                  \
00402             int cmp = (a_cmp)(node, tnode);                             \
00403             if (cmp < 0) {                                              \
00404                 tnode = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);          \
00405             } else if (cmp > 0) {                                       \
00406                 ret = tnode;                                            \
00407                 tnode = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);         \
00408             } else {                                                    \
00409                 break;                                                  \
00410             }                                                           \
00411             assert(tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil);                          \
00412         }                                                               \
00413     }                                                                   \
00414     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00415         ret = (NULL);                                                   \
00416     }                                                                   \
00417     return (ret);                                                       \
00418 }                                                                       \
00419 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00420 a_prefix##search(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key) {                     \
00421     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00422     int cmp;                                                            \
00423     ret = rbtree->rbt_root;                                             \
00424     while (ret != &rbtree->rbt_nil                                      \
00425       && (cmp = (a_cmp)(key, ret)) != 0) {                              \
00426         if (cmp < 0) {                                                  \
00427             ret = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, ret);                  \
00428         } else {                                                        \
00429             ret = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, ret);                 \
00430         }                                                               \
00431     }                                                                   \
00432     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00433         ret = (NULL);                                                   \
00434     }                                                                   \
00435     return (ret);                                                       \
00436 }                                                                       \
00437 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00438 a_prefix##nsearch(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key) {                    \
00439     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00440     a_type *tnode = rbtree->rbt_root;                                   \
00441     ret = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                                             \
00442     while (tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                 \
00443         int cmp = (a_cmp)(key, tnode);                                  \
00444         if (cmp < 0) {                                                  \
00445             ret = tnode;                                                \
00446             tnode = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);              \
00447         } else if (cmp > 0) {                                           \
00448             tnode = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);             \
00449         } else {                                                        \
00450             ret = tnode;                                                \
00451             break;                                                      \
00452         }                                                               \
00453     }                                                                   \
00454     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00455         ret = (NULL);                                                   \
00456     }                                                                   \
00457     return (ret);                                                       \
00458 }                                                                       \
00459 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00460 a_prefix##psearch(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *key) {                    \
00461     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00462     a_type *tnode = rbtree->rbt_root;                                   \
00463     ret = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                                             \
00464     while (tnode != &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                 \
00465         int cmp = (a_cmp)(key, tnode);                                  \
00466         if (cmp < 0) {                                                  \
00467             tnode = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);              \
00468         } else if (cmp > 0) {                                           \
00469             ret = tnode;                                                \
00470             tnode = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, tnode);             \
00471         } else {                                                        \
00472             ret = tnode;                                                \
00473             break;                                                      \
00474         }                                                               \
00475     }                                                                   \
00476     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00477         ret = (NULL);                                                   \
00478     }                                                                   \
00479     return (ret);                                                       \
00480 }                                                                       \
00481 a_attr void                                                             \
00482 a_prefix##insert(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node) {                    \
00483     struct {                                                            \
00484         a_type *node;                                                   \
00485         int cmp;                                                        \
00486     } path[sizeof(void *) << 4], *pathp;                                \
00487     rbt_node_new(a_type, a_field, rbtree, node);                        \
00488     /* Wind. */                                                         \
00489     path->node = rbtree->rbt_root;                                      \
00490     for (pathp = path; pathp->node != &rbtree->rbt_nil; pathp++) {      \
00491         int cmp = pathp->cmp = a_cmp(node, pathp->node);                \
00492         assert(cmp != 0);                                               \
00493         if (cmp < 0) {                                                  \
00494             pathp[1].node = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,              \
00495               pathp->node);                                             \
00496         } else {                                                        \
00497             pathp[1].node = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field,             \
00498               pathp->node);                                             \
00499         }                                                               \
00500     }                                                                   \
00501     pathp->node = node;                                                 \
00502     /* Unwind. */                                                       \
00503     for (pathp--; (uintptr_t)pathp >= (uintptr_t)path; pathp--) {       \
00504         a_type *cnode = pathp->node;                                    \
00505         if (pathp->cmp < 0) {                                           \
00506             a_type *left = pathp[1].node;                               \
00507             rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, cnode, left);                \
00508             if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, left)) {                  \
00509                 a_type *leftleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, left);\
00510                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, leftleft)) {          \
00511                     /* Fix up 4-node. */                                \
00512                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00513                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, leftleft);          \
00514                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, cnode, tnode);   \
00515                     cnode = tnode;                                      \
00516                 }                                                       \
00517             } else {                                                    \
00518                 return;                                                 \
00519             }                                                           \
00520         } else {                                                        \
00521             a_type *right = pathp[1].node;                              \
00522             rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, cnode, right);              \
00523             if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, right)) {                 \
00524                 a_type *left = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, cnode);   \
00525                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, left)) {              \
00526                     /* Split 4-node. */                                 \
00527                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, left);              \
00528                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, right);             \
00529                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, cnode);               \
00530                 } else {                                                \
00531                     /* Lean left. */                                    \
00532                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00533                     bool tred = rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, cnode);   \
00534                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, cnode, tnode);    \
00535                     rbtn_color_set(a_type, a_field, tnode, tred);       \
00536                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, cnode);               \
00537                     cnode = tnode;                                      \
00538                 }                                                       \
00539             } else {                                                    \
00540                 return;                                                 \
00541             }                                                           \
00542         }                                                               \
00543         pathp->node = cnode;                                            \
00544     }                                                                   \
00545     /* Set root, and make it black. */                                  \
00546     rbtree->rbt_root = path->node;                                      \
00547     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, rbtree->rbt_root);                  \
00548 }                                                                       \
00549 a_attr void                                                             \
00550 a_prefix##remove(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node) {                    \
00551     struct {                                                            \
00552         a_type *node;                                                   \
00553         int cmp;                                                        \
00554     } *pathp, *nodep, path[sizeof(void *) << 4];                        \
00555     /* Wind. */                                                         \
00556     nodep = NULL; /* Silence compiler warning. */                       \
00557     path->node = rbtree->rbt_root;                                      \
00558     for (pathp = path; pathp->node != &rbtree->rbt_nil; pathp++) {      \
00559         int cmp = pathp->cmp = a_cmp(node, pathp->node);                \
00560         if (cmp < 0) {                                                  \
00561             pathp[1].node = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,              \
00562               pathp->node);                                             \
00563         } else {                                                        \
00564             pathp[1].node = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field,             \
00565               pathp->node);                                             \
00566             if (cmp == 0) {                                             \
00567                 /* Find node's successor, in preparation for swap. */   \
00568                 pathp->cmp = 1;                                         \
00569                 nodep = pathp;                                          \
00570                 for (pathp++; pathp->node != &rbtree->rbt_nil;          \
00571                   pathp++) {                                            \
00572                     pathp->cmp = -1;                                    \
00573                     pathp[1].node = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,      \
00574                       pathp->node);                                     \
00575                 }                                                       \
00576                 break;                                                  \
00577             }                                                           \
00578         }                                                               \
00579     }                                                                   \
00580     assert(nodep->node == node);                                        \
00581     pathp--;                                                            \
00582     if (pathp->node != node) {                                          \
00583         /* Swap node with its successor. */                             \
00584         bool tred = rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);         \
00585         rbtn_color_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,                    \
00586           rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, node));                         \
00587         rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,                     \
00588           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node));                        \
00589         /* If node's successor is its right child, the following code */\
00590         /* will do the wrong thing for the right child pointer.       */\
00591         /* However, it doesn't matter, because the pointer will be    */\
00592         /* properly set when the successor is pruned.                 */\
00593         rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,                    \
00594           rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, node));                       \
00595         rbtn_color_set(a_type, a_field, node, tred);                    \
00596         /* The pruned leaf node's child pointers are never accessed   */\
00597         /* again, so don't bother setting them to nil.                */\
00598         nodep->node = pathp->node;                                      \
00599         pathp->node = node;                                             \
00600         if (nodep == path) {                                            \
00601             rbtree->rbt_root = nodep->node;                             \
00602         } else {                                                        \
00603             if (nodep[-1].cmp < 0) {                                    \
00604                 rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, nodep[-1].node,          \
00605                   nodep->node);                                         \
00606             } else {                                                    \
00607                 rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, nodep[-1].node,         \
00608                   nodep->node);                                         \
00609             }                                                           \
00610         }                                                               \
00611     } else {                                                            \
00612         a_type *left = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node);            \
00613         if (left != &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                 \
00614             /* node has no successor, but it has a left child.        */\
00615             /* Splice node out, without losing the left child.        */\
00616             assert(rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, node) == false);       \
00617             assert(rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, left));                \
00618             rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, left);                      \
00619             if (pathp == path) {                                        \
00620                 rbtree->rbt_root = left;                                \
00621             } else {                                                    \
00622                 if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                                \
00623                     rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,      \
00624                       left);                                            \
00625                 } else {                                                \
00626                     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,     \
00627                       left);                                            \
00628                 }                                                       \
00629             }                                                           \
00630             return;                                                     \
00631         } else if (pathp == path) {                                     \
00632             /* The tree only contained one node. */                     \
00633             rbtree->rbt_root = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                        \
00634             return;                                                     \
00635         }                                                               \
00636     }                                                                   \
00637     if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, pathp->node)) {                   \
00638         /* Prune red node, which requires no fixup. */                  \
00639         assert(pathp[-1].cmp < 0);                                      \
00640         rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,                  \
00641           &rbtree->rbt_nil);                                            \
00642         return;                                                         \
00643     }                                                                   \
00644     /* The node to be pruned is black, so unwind until balance is     */\
00645     /* restored.                                                      */\
00646     pathp->node = &rbtree->rbt_nil;                                     \
00647     for (pathp--; (uintptr_t)pathp >= (uintptr_t)path; pathp--) {       \
00648         assert(pathp->cmp != 0);                                        \
00649         if (pathp->cmp < 0) {                                           \
00650             rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,                 \
00651               pathp[1].node);                                           \
00652             assert(rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, pathp[1].node)         \
00653               == false);                                                \
00654             if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, pathp->node)) {           \
00655                 a_type *right = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field,         \
00656                   pathp->node);                                         \
00657                 a_type *rightleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,      \
00658                   right);                                               \
00659                 a_type *tnode;                                          \
00660                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, rightleft)) {         \
00661                     /* In the following diagrams, ||, //, and \\      */\
00662                     /* indicate the path to the removed node.         */\
00663                     /*                                                */\
00664                     /*      ||                                        */\
00665                     /*    pathp(r)                                    */\
00666                     /*  //        \                                   */\
00667                     /* (b)        (b)                                 */\
00668                     /*           /                                    */\
00669                     /*          (r)                                   */\
00670                     /*                                                */\
00671                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);       \
00672                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, right, tnode);   \
00673                     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node, tnode);\
00674                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,      \
00675                       tnode);                                           \
00676                 } else {                                                \
00677                     /*      ||                                        */\
00678                     /*    pathp(r)                                    */\
00679                     /*  //        \                                   */\
00680                     /* (b)        (b)                                 */\
00681                     /*           /                                    */\
00682                     /*          (b)                                   */\
00683                     /*                                                */\
00684                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,      \
00685                       tnode);                                           \
00686                 }                                                       \
00687                 /* Balance restored, but rotation modified subtree    */\
00688                 /* root.                                              */\
00689                 assert((uintptr_t)pathp > (uintptr_t)path);             \
00690                 if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                                \
00691                     rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,      \
00692                       tnode);                                           \
00693                 } else {                                                \
00694                     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,     \
00695                       tnode);                                           \
00696                 }                                                       \
00697                 return;                                                 \
00698             } else {                                                    \
00699                 a_type *right = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field,         \
00700                   pathp->node);                                         \
00701                 a_type *rightleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,      \
00702                   right);                                               \
00703                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, rightleft)) {         \
00704                     /*      ||                                        */\
00705                     /*    pathp(b)                                    */\
00706                     /*  //        \                                   */\
00707                     /* (b)        (b)                                 */\
00708                     /*           /                                    */\
00709                     /*          (r)                                   */\
00710                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00711                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, rightleft);         \
00712                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, right, tnode);   \
00713                     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node, tnode);\
00714                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,      \
00715                       tnode);                                           \
00716                     /* Balance restored, but rotation modified        */\
00717                     /* subree root, which may actually be the tree    */\
00718                     /* root.                                          */\
00719                     if (pathp == path) {                                \
00720                         /* Set root. */                                 \
00721                         rbtree->rbt_root = tnode;                       \
00722                     } else {                                            \
00723                         if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                        \
00724                             rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field,              \
00725                               pathp[-1].node, tnode);                   \
00726                         } else {                                        \
00727                             rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field,             \
00728                               pathp[-1].node, tnode);                   \
00729                         }                                               \
00730                     }                                                   \
00731                     return;                                             \
00732                 } else {                                                \
00733                     /*      ||                                        */\
00734                     /*    pathp(b)                                    */\
00735                     /*  //        \                                   */\
00736                     /* (b)        (b)                                 */\
00737                     /*           /                                    */\
00738                     /*          (b)                                   */\
00739                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00740                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);         \
00741                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,      \
00742                       tnode);                                           \
00743                     pathp->node = tnode;                                \
00744                 }                                                       \
00745             }                                                           \
00746         } else {                                                        \
00747             a_type *left;                                               \
00748             rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,                \
00749               pathp[1].node);                                           \
00750             left = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);         \
00751             if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, left)) {                  \
00752                 a_type *tnode;                                          \
00753                 a_type *leftright = rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field,     \
00754                   left);                                                \
00755                 a_type *leftrightleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field,  \
00756                   leftright);                                           \
00757                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, leftrightleft)) {     \
00758                     /*      ||                                        */\
00759                     /*    pathp(b)                                    */\
00760                     /*   /        \\                                  */\
00761                     /* (r)        (b)                                 */\
00762                     /*   \                                            */\
00763                     /*   (b)                                          */\
00764                     /*   /                                            */\
00765                     /* (r)                                            */\
00766                     a_type *unode;                                      \
00767                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, leftrightleft);     \
00768                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,     \
00769                       unode);                                           \
00770                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,     \
00771                       tnode);                                           \
00772                     rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, unode, tnode);      \
00773                     rbtn_rotate_left(a_type, a_field, unode, tnode);    \
00774                 } else {                                                \
00775                     /*      ||                                        */\
00776                     /*    pathp(b)                                    */\
00777                     /*   /        \\                                  */\
00778                     /* (r)        (b)                                 */\
00779                     /*   \                                            */\
00780                     /*   (b)                                          */\
00781                     /*   /                                            */\
00782                     /* (b)                                            */\
00783                     assert(leftright != &rbtree->rbt_nil);              \
00784                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, leftright);           \
00785                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,     \
00786                       tnode);                                           \
00787                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, tnode);             \
00788                 }                                                       \
00789                 /* Balance restored, but rotation modified subtree    */\
00790                 /* root, which may actually be the tree root.         */\
00791                 if (pathp == path) {                                    \
00792                     /* Set root. */                                     \
00793                     rbtree->rbt_root = tnode;                           \
00794                 } else {                                                \
00795                     if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                            \
00796                         rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,  \
00797                           tnode);                                       \
00798                     } else {                                            \
00799                         rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node, \
00800                           tnode);                                       \
00801                     }                                                   \
00802                 }                                                       \
00803                 return;                                                 \
00804             } else if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, pathp->node)) {    \
00805                 a_type *leftleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, left);\
00806                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, leftleft)) {          \
00807                     /*        ||                                      */\
00808                     /*      pathp(r)                                  */\
00809                     /*     /        \\                                */\
00810                     /*   (b)        (b)                               */\
00811                     /*   /                                            */\
00812                     /* (r)                                            */\
00813                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00814                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);       \
00815                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, left);                \
00816                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, leftleft);          \
00817                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,     \
00818                       tnode);                                           \
00819                     /* Balance restored, but rotation modified        */\
00820                     /* subtree root.                                  */\
00821                     assert((uintptr_t)pathp > (uintptr_t)path);         \
00822                     if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                            \
00823                         rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node,  \
00824                           tnode);                                       \
00825                     } else {                                            \
00826                         rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field, pathp[-1].node, \
00827                           tnode);                                       \
00828                     }                                                   \
00829                     return;                                             \
00830                 } else {                                                \
00831                     /*        ||                                      */\
00832                     /*      pathp(r)                                  */\
00833                     /*     /        \\                                */\
00834                     /*   (b)        (b)                               */\
00835                     /*   /                                            */\
00836                     /* (b)                                            */\
00837                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, left);                \
00838                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, pathp->node);       \
00839                     /* Balance restored. */                             \
00840                     return;                                             \
00841                 }                                                       \
00842             } else {                                                    \
00843                 a_type *leftleft = rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, left);\
00844                 if (rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, leftleft)) {          \
00845                     /*               ||                               */\
00846                     /*             pathp(b)                           */\
00847                     /*            /        \\                         */\
00848                     /*          (b)        (b)                        */\
00849                     /*          /                                     */\
00850                     /*        (r)                                     */\
00851                     a_type *tnode;                                      \
00852                     rbtn_black_set(a_type, a_field, leftleft);          \
00853                     rbtn_rotate_right(a_type, a_field, pathp->node,     \
00854                       tnode);                                           \
00855                     /* Balance restored, but rotation modified        */\
00856                     /* subtree root, which may actually be the tree   */\
00857                     /* root.                                          */\
00858                     if (pathp == path) {                                \
00859                         /* Set root. */                                 \
00860                         rbtree->rbt_root = tnode;                       \
00861                     } else {                                            \
00862                         if (pathp[-1].cmp < 0) {                        \
00863                             rbtn_left_set(a_type, a_field,              \
00864                               pathp[-1].node, tnode);                   \
00865                         } else {                                        \
00866                             rbtn_right_set(a_type, a_field,             \
00867                               pathp[-1].node, tnode);                   \
00868                         }                                               \
00869                     }                                                   \
00870                     return;                                             \
00871                 } else {                                                \
00872                     /*               ||                               */\
00873                     /*             pathp(b)                           */\
00874                     /*            /        \\                         */\
00875                     /*          (b)        (b)                        */\
00876                     /*          /                                     */\
00877                     /*        (b)                                     */\
00878                     rbtn_red_set(a_type, a_field, left);                \
00879                 }                                                       \
00880             }                                                           \
00881         }                                                               \
00882     }                                                                   \
00883     /* Set root. */                                                     \
00884     rbtree->rbt_root = path->node;                                      \
00885     assert(rbtn_red_get(a_type, a_field, rbtree->rbt_root) == false);   \
00886 }                                                                       \
00887 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00888 a_prefix##iter_recurse(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node,                \
00889   a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg) {           \
00890     if (node == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                     \
00891         return (&rbtree->rbt_nil);                                      \
00892     } else {                                                            \
00893         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00894         if ((ret = a_prefix##iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtn_left_get(a_type, \
00895           a_field, node), cb, arg)) != &rbtree->rbt_nil                 \
00896           || (ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {                   \
00897             return (ret);                                               \
00898         }                                                               \
00899         return (a_prefix##iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtn_right_get(a_type,   \
00900           a_field, node), cb, arg));                                    \
00901     }                                                                   \
00902 }                                                                       \
00903 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00904 a_prefix##iter_start(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start, a_type *node,   \
00905   a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg) {           \
00906     int cmp = a_cmp(start, node);                                       \
00907     if (cmp < 0) {                                                      \
00908         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00909         if ((ret = a_prefix##iter_start(rbtree, start,                  \
00910           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg)) !=            \
00911           &rbtree->rbt_nil || (ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {  \
00912             return (ret);                                               \
00913         }                                                               \
00914         return (a_prefix##iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtn_right_get(a_type,   \
00915           a_field, node), cb, arg));                                    \
00916     } else if (cmp > 0) {                                               \
00917         return (a_prefix##iter_start(rbtree, start,                     \
00918           rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg));             \
00919     } else {                                                            \
00920         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00921         if ((ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {                    \
00922             return (ret);                                               \
00923         }                                                               \
00924         return (a_prefix##iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtn_right_get(a_type,   \
00925           a_field, node), cb, arg));                                    \
00926     }                                                                   \
00927 }                                                                       \
00928 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00929 a_prefix##iter(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start, a_type *(*cb)(        \
00930   a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg) {                         \
00931     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00932     if (start != NULL) {                                                \
00933         ret = a_prefix##iter_start(rbtree, start, rbtree->rbt_root,     \
00934           cb, arg);                                                     \
00935     } else {                                                            \
00936         ret = a_prefix##iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtree->rbt_root, cb, arg);\
00937     }                                                                   \
00938     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00939         ret = NULL;                                                     \
00940     }                                                                   \
00941     return (ret);                                                       \
00942 }                                                                       \
00943 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00944 a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *node,        \
00945   a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg) {           \
00946     if (node == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                     \
00947         return (&rbtree->rbt_nil);                                      \
00948     } else {                                                            \
00949         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00950         if ((ret = a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(rbtree,               \
00951           rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg)) !=           \
00952           &rbtree->rbt_nil || (ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {  \
00953             return (ret);                                               \
00954         }                                                               \
00955         return (a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(rbtree,                  \
00956           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg));              \
00957     }                                                                   \
00958 }                                                                       \
00959 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00960 a_prefix##reverse_iter_start(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start,         \
00961   a_type *node, a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *),          \
00962   void *arg) {                                                          \
00963     int cmp = a_cmp(start, node);                                       \
00964     if (cmp > 0) {                                                      \
00965         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00966         if ((ret = a_prefix##reverse_iter_start(rbtree, start,          \
00967           rbtn_right_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg)) !=           \
00968           &rbtree->rbt_nil || (ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {  \
00969             return (ret);                                               \
00970         }                                                               \
00971         return (a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(rbtree,                  \
00972           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg));              \
00973     } else if (cmp < 0) {                                               \
00974         return (a_prefix##reverse_iter_start(rbtree, start,             \
00975           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg));              \
00976     } else {                                                            \
00977         a_type *ret;                                                    \
00978         if ((ret = cb(rbtree, node, arg)) != NULL) {                    \
00979             return (ret);                                               \
00980         }                                                               \
00981         return (a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(rbtree,                  \
00982           rbtn_left_get(a_type, a_field, node), cb, arg));              \
00983     }                                                                   \
00984 }                                                                       \
00985 a_attr a_type *                                                         \
00986 a_prefix##reverse_iter(a_rbt_type *rbtree, a_type *start,               \
00987   a_type *(*cb)(a_rbt_type *, a_type *, void *), void *arg) {           \
00988     a_type *ret;                                                        \
00989     if (start != NULL) {                                                \
00990         ret = a_prefix##reverse_iter_start(rbtree, start,               \
00991           rbtree->rbt_root, cb, arg);                                   \
00992     } else {                                                            \
00993         ret = a_prefix##reverse_iter_recurse(rbtree, rbtree->rbt_root,  \
00994           cb, arg);                                                     \
00995     }                                                                   \
00996     if (ret == &rbtree->rbt_nil) {                                      \
00997         ret = NULL;                                                     \
00998     }                                                                   \
00999     return (ret);                                                       \
01000 }
